DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is investigating the effect of testosterone treatment on paraoxonase level in male patients with hypogonadotrophic hypogonadism
DOC.brief_title: Testosterone Replacement Therapy Decreases Plasma Paraoxonase 1 Enzyme Activity In Male Patients With Hypogonadism
DOC.criteria: Volunteers patients with hypogonadism Coronary heart disease Other pituitary/hypothalamic disorders or other nonhypogonadism diseases None was receiving vitamins, lipidlowering drugs, or other medications known to interfere with PON1 activity, lipid profile, or gonadal function
